MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: This mapping will load data from the source table INVENTORY_BALANCE to the target table STG_OW_WIP_INV_BALANCE
MAPPING.NAME: m_STG_WIP_INV_BAL_OW

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This is the expression transformation.It defaults the columns PROCESS_TIMESTAMP,PROCESSED_USERID,PROCESSED_FLAG and directly loads the other columns.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_DEFAULT_VALUES

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This is the source qualifier which contains the INVENTORY_BALANCE data.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_INVENTORY_BALANCE

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Lookup on DA.STYLE to get the CORP_DIVISION_CD
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_STYLE

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This is the expression transformation.It defaults the columns PROCESS_TIMESTAMP,PROCESSED_USERID,PROCESSED_FLAG and directly loads the other columns.
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_DEFAULT_VALUES

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This is the source qualifier which contains the INVENTORY_BALANCE data.
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_INVENTORY_BALANCE

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: Lookup on DA.STYLE to get the CORP_DIVISION_CD
INSTANCE.NAME: LKP_STYLE

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Maximum Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Maximum Percentage of Total Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Additional Concurrent Pipelines for Lookup Cache Creation
Save session log for these runs
Session Log File Max Time Period

TASKINSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: This session will load data from the source table INVENTORY_BALANCE to the target table STG_OW_WIP_INV_BALANCE
TASKINSTANCE.NAME: s_m_STG_WIP_INV_BAL_OW

WORKFLOWVARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: Status of the previous task that is not disabled
